mapper.update: update t_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, account, password, mobile, create_time from t_user
